alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 16 at 1:32PM CDT until October 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT LATE TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA AS WELL AS THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH ERC AND KBDI VALUES... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA AS WELL AS THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North around 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
